meanings.definition: To eat something, especially with a crunching sound.
meanings.sent1: I love to munch on popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: She decided to munch on an apple for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: The chipmunk would munch on nuts all day long.
meanings.sent4: The waves seemed to munch on the sandy shore.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar would munch through the leaves voraciously.

meanings.sent1: I grabbed a quick munch before heading out.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine had a variety of munch options.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was full of delicious munch.
meanings.sent4: The munch at the party was a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent5: The kids enjoyed a munch of cookies and milk after school.
